context.title: Operations
context.description: After selecting an algorithm in the Algorithms view, the corresponding entry will appear in the Operations view. The Operations view allows you to enter the input source (either the text editor or a file) and the output destination (a file). Via drag and drop from the keystore a key can be added to a specific operation. It is necessary to add a matching key before executing an algorithm. To execute an algorithm, after all parameters are set correctly, click on the execute icon in the upper right corner of the Operations view.
